Review Text: I bought this phone a little doubtful If it would be in good condition. I ordered it in good condition and bit excellent and with the price I was a little scared. Bit to say the least this thing is spotless. The screen has zero scratches I mean zero. The only sign of wear is the scratches around the charging port and the micro scratches around the body of the phone. If I showed this to somebody and asked then if they think I bought it new or used they would say new. Everything works perfectly and this phone was in pristine condition. It was by far the cheapest option and it really came through. I highly recommend this phone if you are on a budget but want a high end phone. I'm extremely satisfied with the final product and I will be recommending this to friends and family.
Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024

Review Text: The media could not be loaded.If no FURTHER edits are posted after this review, then everything's working as it should again!] : After posting this review, I'm STILL satisfied with the PHONE itself! Don't get me wrong, this thing is BADASS for the price I got it for! Still awesome!The only thing I found, and you can see for yourself in the video that I posted above where I write "Pen Works Great" was, that I'd constantly receive this message, saying that my phone wouldn't connect to the S PEN that the phone came with, in conjunction with denying me of the (Air Actions) features that the phone comes programmed with?So I just simply bought a brand new ("Samsung" branded) S Pen, and NOW the phone and ALL of its features works %100 as it should! I'm assuming the S Pen that came with the phone was an aftermarket pen or something. So in conclusion, if you run into the same issue, just buy a new S Pen from "Samsung" themselves! It fixed the issue for me!Shipping:Phone arrived immediately on the next business day (Monday), 3 days after ordering it (Friday).In the box:-Phone-Fast Adaptive Charger Base-Fast Charging CableUnboxing/ Initial Impression:Outstanding condition of the phone itself! Not a single scratch, not a single fingerprint (other than my own fingerprints after unwrapping it). The box came well-packaged, and inside of an envelope.SIM Installation:Now, I DO have to say..-I read another reviewers comment, saying that BEFORE installing the SIM card, one should UPDATE THE PHONE'S SOFTWARE until it no longer needs to update. Which I did. So, after it updated to December's latest software.. I installed the SIM card. Works flawlessly. Sent and received phone calls/ texts/ etc.S Pen:Pen works great!Final words:If you're thinking about it... DON'T THINK ABOUT IT. Get the phone! Highly recommend selecting the "excellent condition" option. I've just upgraded from the Samsung Galaxy S10 to this Galaxy S22 Ultra, and WOW have I been missing out on this technology.. Time will always tell, so look out for any edits, but so far so good!
Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023

Review Text: Ordered a Refurbed S22 Ultra. Got the device. Set up the device. Thought things were fine. Until the first time I left the house.The device works fine as long as I'm connected to WiFi and have WiFi calling enabled. I can call, text, MMS, whatever. But ONLY if I'm connected to WiFi and have WiFi calling enabled.As soon as I disconnect WiFi calling, I lose EVERYTHING. No voice. No data. No MMS. No nothing.I've tried with TWO different mobile providers using both physical and eSIMs in the device.Same result with each.This appears to be a known issue with this device based on the literal hundreds of similar posts on Reddit and other online forums.I've tried reaching out via formal channels on Amazon help and support, but the only response I've been given was a question about which mobile provider I'm using. This shouldn't matter since the phone is marked as "Unlocked".I've reached out now, a second time, to Amazon help in hopes that the seller will communicate with me, but I'm not hopeful at this point. I'm understanding why WirelessGlobe only has an 80% positive in the last 12 months.If I'm wrong and they fix this situation quickly and ammicably, I'll happily update my review, but my first impressions with them are not great.Again, if I'm wrong and they fix this appropriately, this review will be replaced with an updated review, but I want people to know that they are VERY slow to handle these situations and it's frustrating.
Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024

Review Text: I could not have asked for a better deal. This phone was fully unlocked, works with almost every provider out there, and it was dang near half off a brand new one. It came with a few dings in the sides, but they were extremely shallow and hard to notice. The screen was flawless, the camera is beautiful the pen works amazingly, everything is working exactly as it should. I was hesitant, but I'm so glad I bought this phone for myself. If I could afford one for all of my friends I would get them all one. The fingerprint reader works great(although all of these phones might have issues when you get a screen protector), the colors are vibrant, microphone is epic, the speakers work well, the battery holds all day. That said, this model does nor come with a headphone jack, but who doesn't have a pair of Bluetooth headphones at this point? I don't use the face scanner because it is not as secure as fingerprints. I could go on and on, but if you're considering it and you can afford the money(I saved up and bought mine outright so I own it), I highly recommend this!
Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2022

Review Text: As the headline states, the phone arrived in great physical condition and seems to be working fine up to this point. However, upon starting up the device, it was locked to Verizon and i have T-Mobile so the phone was not working with my sim card. I called Verizon and after about 15 minutes of back and forth and some questions, they were able to unlock the phone for me. Be weary about receiving a locked phone from this seller. If the roles were reversed, and I had Verizon and the phone was locked to, lets just say ATT, the phone would have bloatware that could not be removed and the process would be much more difficult, if even possible. Overall, I'm happy with the purchase and the price point provided
Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2022

Review Text: In our case the refurbished S22 Ultra was absolutely flawless.Some people are disturbed that when they turn on the phone the first screen says "Verizon". This doesn't mean the phone isn't unlocked.You need to follow these instructions when you get the phone.BEFORE YOU PUT YOUR SIM CARD INTO THE PHONE DO THE FOLLOWING:1) Connect the phone to your Wifi Network.2) Settings -> Search for "Software Update" and update the Android Operating System3) Repeat Step #2 above till the latest version of Android is installed.4) Insert your SIM Card. In our case we inserted a T-Mobile SIM Card5) When asked if you want to switch the phone to your mobile carries say yes.In our case accepting at Step#5 caused our phone's start screen to say T-Mobile, and T-Mobile's built-in apps replaced the Verizon Apps previously on our phone.
Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023

Review Text: I received two phones that both had a glitch in that there was a log in on the home page requiring a password?No one from Greentech, a repair shop or any of my tech friends knew what it was for or what to do about it.I tried every log in I had for Google, WiFi, my old phone and several others with no luck.Greentech had never hear of it, even though I got two phones in a row that had this issue.Most everyone thought it must have been the password of the previous owner and it could not be erased from the phone.Fortunately I was able to do a search and sure enough it was not a common issue, but had been one on Samsung phones.What was required was a factory reset.The problem for some is that this erases all the data from your phone.In my case, I was transferring data from my old phone to this S22 Ultra., so it didn't matter.The transfer of data was done and everything works fine.But I'm definitely keeping my old phone in case this ever happens again!
Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
